name: eae-prism
description: Monorepo with Flutter app, design system, and Elysia backend

scripts.setup: npx nx run eae-prism:install:all &&npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:flutter
scripts.setup:flutter: cd packages/design_system && flutter pub get && cd ../../apps/showroom && flutter pub get && cd ../client && flutter pub get
scripts.setup:platforms: cd apps/client && flutter create . --platforms=web,ios,android && cd ../showroom && flutter create . --platforms=web
scripts.client:ios: open -a Simulator && npx nx run eae-prism:client:ios
